31335.「要求通り オレと <cs_pchero>の\n ふたりだけで 来てやったぞぉ！:
As requested, just the two of us, me and
<cs_pchero>. Hey! Come on out, Sainz!

31337.「……バトルマスターの証は\n ちゃんと 持ってきたんでしょうね？:
...I hope you brought your Gladiator's
Grant with you?

31338.「ああ。肌身 はなさずにな。\n しかし オメーが そんなにまで\n こいつを:
Ah. Keep it close to your skin. But I didn't
know you wanted it that badly.

31339.「そいつは アンタが オレのことを\n 認めなかった証ですからね……。: That's because you didn't approve of my...

31340.「今から アンタの自慢の弟子を倒し\n オレこそが 証を受け継ぐにふさわしい\n:
From now on, I'm going to defeat your proud apprentice and prove that I am the battle master worthy of inheriting the Gladiator's
Grant!

31341.「オメーは 相変わらず わかっちゃいねーな。\n オレたちは 狂戦士じゃないんだ:
You still don't get it, do you? We are not mad
warriors... and being strong is not enough.

31342.「アンタは いつだって それだ！\n バトルマスターは 戦いに生きる存在だぜ。\:
You'll always be that! Battle masters live to
fight. What value is there in anything other
than strength?

31343.「……まあいいさ。\n そんなヤツに オレが手塩にかけて育てた\n <cs_pc:
Well, that's okay. There's no way that the
<cs_pchero> that I took care of and nurtured
would lose to someone like that.

31344.「そういうワケだ。\n あとのことは まかせたぜ。<cs_pchero>！:
That's why. I'll leave the rest to you.
<cs_pchero>!

31345.「<cs_pchero>。お前のことは 恨んじゃいねえ。\n だが オレの強さを:
<cs_pchero>. I hold no grudge against you.
But I will beat you to prove how strong I am!

31346.「恨むんなら ジェイコフの弟子になった\n 自分のウカツさを 恨むんだな！！:
If you're going to resent him, resent your own
cowardice in becoming Jakov's apprentice!

31348.「てっきり 逃げだしたかと思ったが……\n まだ 痛めつけられ足りないようだな。:
I thought he had escaped but I guess he hasn't
been hurt enough.

31349.「さあ 今度こそ どちらが\n バトルマスターの証を継ぐに ふさわしいか\n 決:
Now let's see who is worthy to carry the
Gladiator's Grant!

31350.「ぐうっ……クソッ！\n なぜだ？ なぜ 勝てないっ！？: Ugh... damn it! Why? Why can't I win?

31351.「オレは ただ ひたすら 強くなるためだけに\n すべてを なげうってきたっての:
I've just been willing to drop everything just
to be strong.

31352.「……だからだよ。オメーの強さは\n オメー自身のためのものでしかねえ。\n 本:
That's why. Your strength is only for
yourself. A true battle master is...

31353.「セインズよ。せっかく 手を回して\n 復讐の機会を与えてやったのに そのザマか:
Sainz. I gave you a chance for revenge, and
here you are.

31354.「……まあ いい。\n そのふたりを 呼び寄せたことで\n おまえは用済みだ。も:
Well, that's all right. You're no use to me
now that I've brought you two together. Die
with them!

31355.「……どうして オレなんかを？: Why did you take me on?

31356.「……弟子のモノは 師匠のモノ。\n オメーの命は オレのモノってことさ。\n:
What belongs to the apprentice belongs to the
master. Your life belongs to me. I won't let
you die on your own!

31357.「くっ……悪いな <cs_pchero>。 \n このバケモノの相手は オメーに:
Damn...sorry <cs_pchero>. I'll leave you to
deal with this monster.

31358.「すぐに 戦闘の準備を万全にして\n 戻ってきてくれ。それまで この場は\n な:
Come back when you are fully prepared for
battle. We'll hold this place together until
then!

31360.「いいな。セインズのバカたれに\n 真のバトルマスターの すごみを\n 教えてや:
I'll take that. Show those Sainz assholes what
a true battle master is capable of!!!!!!!

46606.「今度こそ セインズのバカたれに\n 真のバトルマスターの すごみを\n 教えて:
This time, show those idiots at Sainz what a
true battle master is capable of!

46607.「セインズ 目に焼きつけとけよ。 \n <cs_pchero>が 真のバトルマス:
Sainz, keep it in your eyes. Because
<cs_pchero> is going to show you a true
battle master's fight.

60360.「バ バカな……わしの最強のペットが……。: You idiot... my most powerful pet...

60362.「おっと。今度こそ 逃がしゃしねーぞ！:
Oops. This time I'm not gonna let you get
away!

60363.「……ブランドンさん。\n あんたの野望も もう おしまいだ。\n そろそろ 観:
Mr. Brandon. Your ambition is over. It's time
to give up.

60365.「<cs_pchero>。\n お前の戦いを見ていて 師匠の言うことが\n わか:
<cs_pchero>. Watching you fight, I think I
understand what the Master is saying.

60366.「自分のためじゃなく\n 誰かのために戦う……そのための剣。\n それが バトル:
Fighting for someone else, not for yourself...
that's what a sword is for. That's what a
battle master is.

60367.「さあ これにて 一件落着だ。\n ラッカラン島のコロシアムに\n 戻るとするか:
Well, that settles the matter. Let's head back
to the Coliseum on Luckland Island...
